column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A ladyboy was arrested after snatching a phone from a foreigner who was standing on the road making a call.------The incident took place 1:10 am on 1 June 2019 on the corner of 13 and 154 in Sangkat Chey Chomnas
column4: Khan Daun Penh.------The suspect was quickly tackled to the ground and arrested by cops. The transgender thief admitted to carrying out 2 other such street robberies. ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/56375
